Question: Which of the following songs are part of the soundtrack for the movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye' released in 2002?
Options:
A. Jeena Sirf Mere Liye
B. Allah Allah
C. Tumse Milne Ko
D. Chura Liya Hai Tumne
Answer: Jeena Sirf Mere Liye, Allah Allah

Question: Which of the following songs are featured in the movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye' released in 2002?
Options:
A. Jeena Sirf Mere Liye
B. Kaash Ke Tujhse Main Kabhi Milta
C. Tumhare Haath Ki Chudiyan
D. Dil Ne Yeh Kaha Hain Dil Se
Answer: Jeena Sirf Mere Liye, Kaash Ke Tujhse Main Kabhi Milta

Question: Which songs from the movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye' (2002) became major hits?
Options:
A. Jeena Sirf Mere Liye
B. Ek Baar To India
C. Tumse Milne Ki Tamanna Hai
D. Dil Hai Tumhaara
Answer: Jeena Sirf Mere Liye, Ek Baar To India

Answer: Tu Hai Sola, Kaash Ke Tujhse Main Kabhi Milta
